meanings.definition: To make a careless or stupid mistake.
meanings.sent1: He blundered by forgetting his homework at home.
meanings.sent2: She blundered by accidentally deleting the important file.
meanings.sent3: The comedian blundered during his performance, mixing up his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The detective blundered in his investigation, overlooking a crucial clue.
meanings.sent5: The student blundered in the exam, answering all the questions incorrectly.

meanings.sent1: The toddler blundered around the room, bumping into furniture.
meanings.sent2: He blundered through the crowd, trying to find his lost friend.
meanings.sent3: The penguin blundered on the ice, slipping and sliding comically.
meanings.sent4: The robot blundered through the maze, knocking down walls in its path.
meanings.sent5: The drunk man blundered down the street, tripping over his own feet.

meanings.definition: To speak or act in a clumsy or foolish manner.
meanings.sent1: She blundered through her speech, forgetting her lines.
meanings.sent2: He blundered in his attempt to impress the interviewers.
meanings.sent3: The magician blundered during his trick, revealing the hidden card too soon.
meanings.sent4: The politician blundered in his statement, causing confusion among the audience.
meanings.sent5: The actor blundered in his role, delivering his lines with the wrong emotion.
